channel.title: Negative membership
channel.description:
What is this?
Is there a reason BOTH of my accounts have negative membership?
I mean, don't get me wrong I've botted a little, but its not enough to get caught (and I use good bots).
Do you think someone refunded my membership (because I got it from someone's pin)

item.title: Negative membership
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i though u can buy pre-paid cards easily

Read full topic

item.title: Negative membership
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:393678”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=490863.msg3589630#msg3589630 date=1304483378]

The only way to get a membership after this is via pre-paid cards or a debit/credit card. I had -91 days on my first account for like 4 years before I managed to get a pre-paid 90day card (i had a prior agreement with Jagex that if I did this, they would drop the last day). The only way you are going to pay this off, is pre-paid cards though, as they want a guarentee’d payment.

Yeah, some faggot I bought 2 pins for 11m, disputed the payment, and now I have to pay 40 dollars to get my accounts back. This is pissing me off.

Only ever buy pins from people who have over 200 vouches (a general rule I had when I bought pins). You are better off giving your parents the $6 ($5.99 right?) each month and seeing if they will let you put it on their debit card.
[/quote]
Yeah I know that now. i didn’t even know you could dispute it with your phone company.[/quote]
All you gotta do is dispute it with them that you did not authorize that payment/call, and attempt to get it refunded.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Yes, if someone sell’s you a pin they can easily recover the pin… so obviously thats what they did.

Read full topic

item.title: Negative membership
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Its because the method of membership your using has become unavailable. For example you might have had your card stolen so had to cancel it.

So when Jagex come to take your payment for the month they cant so in there eyes you owe them a months membership hence the negative.

Read full topic
